text.title: Cardiff student union calls for cancellation of lecture by Germaine Greer
text.head: Cardiff student union calls for cancellation of lecture by Germaine Greer
Sources

list.item: Damien Gayle. "Caitlyn Jenner 'wanted limelight of female Kardashians' – Germaine Greer" — The Guardian , October 25, 2015
Matt Akersten. "Germaine Greer: 'Trans women aren't 'real' women'" — SameSame.com.au , October 25, 2015
Kirsty Wark. "Germaine Greer on Transexuality - Newsnight" — BBC Newsnight , 23 October 2015
Rachel Melhuish. "Cardiff University: Do not host Germaine Greer" — Change.org , October 22, 2015
